room_title: Escape room "The Miller Family Deed" by Hidden Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: A group of friends and I ran this Miller Deed escape room and it was a blast! We had 8 people in our group and all of us had something to do - there was work to be done down to the wire. We escaped with just a few moments left on the clock with several people who had never done this type of event before. The puzzles were logical and forced us to think outside the box. I'm planning on coming back sometime in April or May!

room_title: Escape room "The Miller Family Deed" by Hidden Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Had a great experience with our group of four. It was very well thought out, unique, fun, and challenging. I would recommend them to anyone and, I would attend again if the opportunity presented itself!

room_title: Escape room "The Miller Family Deed" by Hidden Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Had a great time with our team of two. Very clever puzzles and a compelling story. We'll be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Miller Family Deed" by Hidden Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Our group of five ranging in ages from 14 to 48 had a great time! Well thought out puzzles that were challenging and enjoyable! We will definitely be back when the new room opens!
